title: Predicteform's Zucker Favors Nyquist, Outwork for Derby (Audio)
itunes:title: Predicteform's Zucker Favors Nyquist, Outwork for Derby (Audio)
description:
(Bloomberg) -- Taking Stock with Kathleen Hays and Pimm Fox. GUEST: Dan Zucker, Co-Founder of Predicteform.com, on what his proprietary models are forecasting for the Kentucky Derby.
